This week's top stories include the unsurprising return of Kiss, Les Claypool selling his old bus, Brent Hinds continuing on in a post-Mastodon world, and more! Check out those stories at the links below and don't forget to check out our Top Tracks Of The Week playlist on Spotify here and on Apple Music here. Also, don't forget to check out Metal Injection's Band Of The Month Imperial Triumphant!
